value.Name: Drupal_A 3rd party development library including with Drupal 8 development dependencies is vulnerable to remote code execution.
value.Value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?><FsPickler version="2.0.0.0" type="ES.Taipan.Inspector.AddOns.WebApplicationVulnerability.ApplicationVulnerabilityDescriptor"><value><Id>828613b2-e2b8-437e-ac13-0f6891f95ceb</Id><Application>Drupal</Application><AffectedVersions flags="sequence"><elem>&amp;gt;=8.0.0</elem><elem>&amp;lt;=8.2.1</elem></AffectedVersions><VulnerabilityName>A 3rd party development library including with Drupal 8 development dependencies is vulnerable to remote code execution.</VulnerabilityName><ExternalReferer>CVE-2017-6381, DRUPAL-SA-CORE-2017-001</ExternalReferer><Impact>Medium</Impact></value></FsPickler>
